gm.brink: Someone has seen *them* moving too quick to follow, a blur in the periphery.
gm.givenBrink: You saw *them* , the static on any electronic device intensifying when they are close..

583340515869589522.brink: Sawyer saw you muttering nonsense under their breath, eyes unfocused.
583340515869589522.givenBrink: You saw Cyrus staring into the abyss, their expression a mask of terror..
583340515869589522.name: Sawyer
583340515869589522.look: is always wearing a pair of worn leather boots.
583340515869589522.concept: a dreamer, clinging to the hope of a better tomorrow.

1348988696669458523.brink: Aria saw you fumbling with matches, trying desperately to start a fire.
1348988696669458523.givenBrink: You saw Luna frozen in place, paralyzed by fear..
1348988696669458523.moment: Retrieve a lost item of importance.
1348988696669458523.name: Aria
1348988696669458523.look: has a collection of trinkets and charms.
1348988696669458523.concept: a mechanic, keeping the last vehicles running.
